onyomiExamples.meaning: gentle on the outside but tough on the inside, an iron hand in a velvet glove
being tough on the outside but soft at heart, a faint-hearted person pretending to be brave

kunyomiExamples.meaning: soft, tender, limp, subdued (colour or light) (color), gentle, meek
soft, tender, pliant, supple, limber, limp, gentle, mild, mellow, informal, light, flexible (e.g. thinking)
